Package org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class Summary
BaseOAuth10Client<U extends OAuth10Profile> This class is the base implementation for client supporting OAuth protocol version 1.0.
BaseOAuth20Client<U extends OAuth20Profile> This class is the base implementation for client supporting OAuth protocol version 2.0.
BaseOAuthClient<U extends OAuth20Profile> This class is a base implementation for an OAuth protocol client based on the Scribe library.
CasOAuthWrapperClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users on CAS servers using OAuth wrapper.
DropBoxClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in DropBox.
FacebookClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Facebook.
GitHubClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in GitHub.
Google2Client This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Google using OAuth protocol version 2.0.
LinkedIn2Client This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in LinkedIn (using OAuth 2.0 protocol).
LinkedInClient Deprecated.
PayPalClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in PayPal.
TwitterClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Twitter.
WindowsLiveClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Windows Live (SkyDrive, Hotmail and Messenger).
WordPressClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in WordPress.
YahooClient This class is the OAuth client to authenticate users in Yahoo.
 

Enum Summary
Google2Client.Google2Scope
